The primary measure efficacy change baseline Quantitative MG ( QMG ) score end 3 month . Secondary outcome measure include survival analysis treatment failure , MG-related impairment daily activity , functional assessment , manual muscle testing , SF-36 Health Status , serum concentration antibody acetylcholine receptor .
